text: I Did It is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithI Did It, MommaI DID IT, MAMMA and stars Adele DeGarde, Anita Hendrie, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Adele DeGarde as Gladys, The Little Girl * Anita Hendrie as The Mother * Linda Arvidson as A Visitor * Gladys Egan as The Little Boy * Arthur V. Johnson * Florence Lawrence * Dorothy West as The Maid ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: I Did It (movie)
